Task<DeleteUserCartItemsResponse>

A DeleteUserCartItemsResponse with Success being true if the Ecommerce.Application.Features.CartItem entities were deleted; Success will be false if no Ecommerce.Application.Features.CartItem entities are found or validation of the command fails. Message will contain the message to display to the user.
